list.confirmText: Soll der Eintrag wirklich gelöscht werden?

detail.labelLogExecuted: This flow as been executed "{total}" time in total.
detail.labelLogInstruct: Click on the log file to see more details of the flow execution actions and to replay the flow.

trigger.name: Trigger
trigger.title: Select a start trigger
trigger.helpText: Triggers are used to start flows. After selecting a trigger you can either further define the trigger by adding an IF statement or directly add an action that should be executed then the trigger has been trigggerd.

sequence.selectorTitle: Add IF condition or THEN action
sequence.selectorHelpText:
Conditions are used to filter down the flow. Conditions are made with the Rule Builder and will give out a true or false.

Actions can be used to send emails, create a documents or add tags. Actions can both be used when a condition is true or false.
sequence.conditionExplainsTitle: Select a rule or create a new one
sequence.conditionExplainsDescription: Conditions are build with the Rule Builder. You can either select an existing rule or build your own rule that starts with one of the selectors that are defined by the Flow trigger.

flowNotification.messageDeleteError: Die flow konnte nicht gelöscht werden.
flowNotification.messageSaveError: The flow konnte nicht gespeichert werden.
flowNotification.messageRequiredEventName: Please choose trigger event before save.
